title: Gimtu
description: Gath, Gat, or Geth (Hebrew: גַּת)) is mentioned in the El-Amarna letters as Gimti/Gintu/Gimtu. It was one of the five Philistine city-states. The town is mentioned in Neo-Assyrian sources; the modern site is Tel es-Safī.

properties.description: Representative point derived from an OpenStreetMap node
properties.title: OSM location of Tel Zafit
